definition: thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Dogs being guileless signed and delivered.
sentences.chinese: 老实厚道的狗签署并发表了那项声明。

sentences.english: I’ve never seen such kind people as they are.
sentences.chinese: 我从来没见过象他们这样厚道的人。

sentences.english: She's all alone here, and it seems rather unkind to ignore her.
sentences.chinese: 她在这儿举目无亲，咱们不理她就显得太不厚道了。

sentences.english: Your correspondent thinks both sides are being disingenuous.
sentences.chinese: 你们的记者认为两边的人都不厚道。

sentences.english: "Where does the wind go when it stops?"he asked.
sentences.chinese: “风停了厚道哪里去了呢？”小男孩问道。

sentences.english: I've never seen such kind people will be also.
sentences.chinese: 我从来没见过象他们这样厚道的人。

sentences.english: The characteristic is looked that resembles stockily but actually insincere, frequently quarrels with the same table of Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 特点看似敦实却不厚道，经常和同桌巴基斯坦吵架。

sentences.english: Sarah all alone here, and it seems rather unkind to ignore her.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉在这儿举目无亲，咱们不理她就显得太不厚道了。

sentences.english: Maybe we're too hard on Disney.
sentences.chinese: 可能是我们对迪斯尼有点儿不太厚道吧。

sentences.english: UNMERCIFULLY, The Economist works straight through the Chinese New Year.
sentences.chinese: 真不厚道，经济学人在中国农历新年期间要照常工作。

sentences.english: He has his own faults, but all in all, he is an honest man.
sentences.chinese: 他有自己的缺点，但总体上看，他是一个厚道人。

sentences.english: " kindliness , diligence and pragmatics" are the core concepts of the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: “厚道，勤奋，务实”是企业的核心理念。

sentences.english: It was unchristian of him to refuse to help.
sentences.chinese: 他拒绝帮忙，真是有失厚道。

sentences.english: He is so kind and generous that he always casts his bread upon the waters.
sentences.chinese: 他很厚道慷慨，总是做好事而不图回报。
